text: Gladstone is an under construction infill station on the Trillium Line in Ottawa, Ontario. It is being constructed as part of the Stage 2 O-Train expansion and is scheduled for completion in 2022. The station will consist of two side platforms and is located north of Gladstone Avenue, near Preston Street. ==References== Category:Trillium Line stations Category:Railway stations scheduled to open in 2022
title: Gladstone station (Ottawa)
